components.name: Verify
components.description: May be impacted by SMS delivery issues

components.name: Customer Support Center
components.description: This includes services related to reaching support via phone, email, and chat.

incidents.name: SMS Delivery Failures From Denmark Mobile Networks to a Subset of Twilio's Denmark Long Codes

incident_updates.body: We continue experiencing SMS delivery failures from Denmark Mobile Networks to a subset of Twilio's Denmark long codes. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We expect to provide another update in 24 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We continue experiencing SMS delivery failures from Denmark Mobile Networks to a subset of Twilio's Denmark long codes. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We expect to provide another update in 24 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We continue experiencing SMS delivery failures from Denmark Mobile Networks to a subset of Twilio's Denmark long codes. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We expect to provide another update in 24 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We continue experiencing SMS delivery failures from Denmark Mobile Networks to a subset of Twilio's Denmark long codes. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We expect to provide another update in 16 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We continue experiencing SMS delivery failures from Denmark Mobile Networks to a subset of Twilio's Denmark long codes. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We expect to provide another update in 8 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We continue experiencing SMS delivery failures from Denmark Mobile Networks to a subset of Twilio's Denmark long codes. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We expect to provide another update in 4 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are experiencing SMS delivery failures from Denmark Mobile Networks to a subset of Twilio's Denmark long codes. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We expect to provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

Our monitoring systems have detected a potential issue with inbound delivery failures. Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. We will update as soon as we have more information.

scheduled_maintenances.name: France Voice Carrier Partner Maintenance

incident_updates.body: Our Voice carrier partner in France is conducting a planned maintenance from 25 October 2023 at 13:00 PDT until 25 October 2023 at 17:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be call failures to and from a subset of France phone numbers.

scheduled_maintenances.name: Belarus SMS Carrier Maintenance - A1, MTS and Life

incident_updates.body: The A1, MTS and Life networks in Belarus are conducting an emergency maintenance from 25 October 2023 at 14:00 PDT until 25 October 2023 at 21:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to A1, MTS, Life Belarus handsets.

scheduled_maintenances.name: United Kingdom Voice Carrier Partner Maintenance

incident_updates.body: Our Voice carrier partner in the UK is conducting a planned maintenance from 25 October 2023 at 17:30 PDT until 25 October 2023 at 21:30 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be call failures from a subset of UK phone numbers.

scheduled_maintenances.name: Brazil Voice Carrier Partner Maintenance

incident_updates.body: Our Voice carrier partner in Brazil is conducting a planned maintenance from 25 October 2023 at 19:50 PDT until 26 October 2023 at 00:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent call failures to a subset of Twilio's Brazil phone numbers.

scheduled_maintenances.name: US SMS Carrier Maintenance - T-Mobile

incident_updates.body: The T-Mobile network in the United States is conducting an emergency maintenance from 25 October 2023 at 20:00 PDT until 26 October 2023 at 04:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from T-Mobile United States handsets.

scheduled_maintenances.name: Canada Account Security Service Partner Maintenance

incident_updates.body:
Our service partner is conducting a series of maintenances from 25 October 2023 at 21:00 PDT until 05 November 2023 at 03:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent API request failures for the following carrier and country: Telus and Koodo networks in Canada

Note, the maintenance will be carried out on each of the following dates and times:

25 October 2023 at 21:00 PDT until 26 October 2023 at 03:00 PDT
28 October 2023 at 21:00 PDT until 29 October 2023 at 03:00 PDT
04 November 2023 at 21:00 PDT until 05 November 2023 at 03:00 PDT

Impacted Products:
Lookup SIM Swap
Legacy Identity MatchAndAttributes

scheduled_maintenances.name: Russia SMS Carrier Maintenance - Tele2

incident_updates.body:
The Tele2 network in Russia is conducting a series of planned maintenances from 01 November 2023 at 13:00 PDT until 29 November 2023 at 17:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to Tele2 Russia handsets.

Note, the maintenance will be carried out on each of the following dates and times:

01 November 2023 at 13:00 PDT until 01 November 2023 at 17:00 PDT
06 November 2023 at 13:00 PDT until 06 November 2023 at 17:00 PDT
08 November 2023 at 13:00 PDT until 08 November 2023 at 17:00 PDT

scheduled_maintenances.name: Montenegro SMS Carrier Maintenance - MTEL

incident_updates.body: Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.
Maintenance will begin as scheduled in 60 minutes.

The MTEL network in Montenegro is conducting a series of planned maintenances from 24 October 2023 at 16:00 PDT until 26 October 2023 at 22:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to MTEL Montenegro handsets.

Note, the maintenance will be carried out on each of the following dates and times:

24 October 2023 at 16:00 PDT until 24 October 2023 at 22:00 PDT
26 October 2023 at 16:00 PDT until 26 October 2023 at 22:00 PDT
